description: Schema for settings.json that controls where template config files are stored. Located at ~/.claude/configs/github-issue-from-templates/settings.json.

configStorage.description: Where template config files are stored. Discriminated on the 'type' field.

oneOf.description: Store configs in a GitHub repository.

owner.description: GitHub owner (user or organization) of the config repository.

repo.description: GitHub repository name where configs are stored.

path.description: Directory path within the repo where config files are stored. Defaults to 'configs/github-issue-from-templates/'.

branch.description: Branch to read from and write to. Defaults to 'main'.
